CustomField.description: Created as a part of SFS-3049
CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(FSM_CumulativeProductiveTimeInMins__c) ) , TEXT( FLOOR(FSM_CumulativeProductiveTimeInMins__c /60)) & " hrs " & TEXT( ROUND (MOD(FSM_CumulativeProductiveTimeInMins__c,60),0)) & " mins ", NULL)
CustomField.label: Cumulative Productive Time
